attributes.action: To buy and fit metal detector gates at schools for kids safety.
attributes.additional_details: Too many kids been stabbed , carrying weapons , knifes etc . Now boy stabbed and killed at school. Something must be done in ASAP. People scared to send kids to schools , parks and even let the kids to go outdoors.
attributes.background: To fit metal detector gates for kids safety at schools.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund all secondary schools to have metal detectors
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714842
